name: Expbbl
description:
A bullet-hell 2D shooter, except there are bubbles instead of bullets.

In Expbbl (formerly named Exponentiation Bubbles), you can unlock, purchase, and upgrade unique items to protect yourself on an endless journey down the bubbly chasms. Discover 17 unique items, 17 unique bubbles, and 17 unique player/item upgrades.

The game is currently in early access (for school project submission), with a planned release date set around early 2022 (will depend on my workload during that semester). While this is intended for a mobile release, a desktop version will also be available.
